description: Unique identifier for the maintenance crew record used for planning, assignment, and reporting.
Human-friendly description or name of the crew for display and selection.
Estimated labor hours associated with the crew—likely capacity per shift or expected hours to complete a standard task; confirm with SME.
Flag indicating whether the crew is dedicated to or authorized for inspections (Y/N) for regulatory or preventive checks.
Name of the workgroup or organizational unit the crew belongs to for labor tracking and permissions.
User ID that created the record for audit purposes.
Date and time when the record was created.
User ID of the last person to modify the record.
Date and time of the most recent update to the record.
Identifier of the designated crew leader—likely an employee or personnel ID used for accountability and approvals; confirm with SME.
